ResourceAbsence.name: ResourceAbsence
ResourceAbsence.description: Represents a time period in which a service resource is unavailable to work in Salesforce Scheduler.

AbsenceNumber.description: (Read only) An auto-generated number identifying the absence.

End.description: The date and time when the absence ends.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the resource absence was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the resource absence was last viewed.

Start.description: The date and time when the absence begins.
